oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Sharḥ al-Nuzhah fī al-ghubār / lil-Imām al-ʻAllāmah Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad al-Bayrūtī : manuscript, undated
Sharḥ Nuzhat al-ḥussāb
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Bayrūtī, Shihāb al-Dīn Aḥmad.
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Ṣāliḥ ibn Khūnd Miyān ibn Mawlānā Aḥmad ibn Mawlānā Shaykh Ḥusām al-Dīn (copyist.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم اصلى الله على سيدنا محمد وآله وصحبه وسلم الحمد لله الذي تحصى نعمة جميع الحساب... :Incipit
Written in one column, 19 lines per page, in black and red.
Black cloth; tan leather spine and corners.
According to the colophon (f. 80r), copy completed in the hand of Ṣāliḥ ibn Khūnd Miyān ibn Mawlānā Aḥmad ibn Mawlānā Shaykh Ḥusām al-Dīn.
On f. 1r, ownership seal: Muḥammad Yūsuf Shāh, 1189 AH [1775 or 6 AD].
MS Arab SM4287. Houghton Library, Harvard University.

Mathematics, Arab
Mathematics
